definitions.definition: Of, near, or relating to the equator .
examples: That plant is best suited to equatorial climates.

definitions.definition: Relating to the midline of any approximately spherical object.
of a bond, lying approximately in the plane of a ring , perpendicular to its axis

main_definition: ( geography ) Of, near, or relating to the equator .
secondary_definitions: Relating to the midline of any approximately spherical object.
( organic chemistry ) of a bond, lying approximately in the plane of a ring , perpendicular to its axis
